name: meetingbooksys-frontend
description: 会议室在线预订系统前端桌面端
author: 会议室预订系统开发团队

scripts.electron:build: npm run build && cp -r dist build_output && rm -rf build_output/mac-arm64 build_output/win-unpacked build_output/linux-unpacked && electron-builder
scripts.electron:build:win: npm run build && cp -r dist build_output && rm -rf build_output/win-unpacked && electron-builder --win
scripts.electron:build:mac: npm run build && cp -r dist build_output && rm -rf build_output/mac-arm64 && ELECTRON_MIRROR=https://npmmirror.com/mirrors/electron/ npm_config_registry=https://registry.npmmirror.com electron-builder --mac
scripts.electron:build:linux: npm run build && cp -r dist build_output && rm -rf build_output/linux-unpacked && electron-builder --linux
